lenders.name: bruce

lenders.occupational_info: I teach in a prison, and it is by turns rewarding, fun, frustrating, and scary. My path through life was not so different that those of my students; it is largely by grace and hard work that I am able to put on my coat and leave each night.

lenders.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves, help them improve their lives through their own hard work by giving them a start.

lenders.name: Elisabeth
lenders.loan_because:
I discovered 'Kiva' in Share International Magazine ( www.share-international.org./ )   I think the
concept of Kiva is brilliant.  Giving small scale borrowers a chance to borrow at reasonable rates, and giving ordinary people who can lend, the opportunity to to find a borrower themselves, forges links between humans.  That's got to be good for all.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a literacy tuition specialist, who works one to one with children of all ages, who need specific help in one or more of the component areas of language learning.

lenders.name: Posy
lenders.loan_because: My first Kiva loan was funded by a Mother's Day gift certificate from my thoughtful daughter!  It's a wonderful way to help mothers all around the world help their families.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: It's a pleasure to be able to help people in a significant, but respectful way.

lenders.name: BLam
lenders.loan_because: I can.  I feel that the first investment of a business is the quintessence of the actual success of the business. And lastly I feel that if I were to be in their position, I would wish for the same.  It's only right to help.
lenders.occupational_info: Investor.  I buy/sell stocks.

lenders.name: Australian friends
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people gain better lives.

lenders.name: Dana
lenders.loan_because: Kiva's mission is one of the most amazing things that I have heard of in a long time.  To be able to help someone change their own life is a gift, and one that I'm excited to take part in.

lenders.loan_because: "I long to accomplish a great and noble task, but my chief duty is to accomplish small tasks as if they were great and noble." Helen Keller
lenders.occupational_info: I help design web sites and computer training guides so that they are simple for people to understand and use.

lenders.name: Daniel

lenders.occupational_info: I am a software engineer who develops  for enterprise level data storage devices.

lenders.name: Edward
lenders.loan_because: I think micro lending may have a much greater potential to make a large impact on the eradication of poverty than government programs and charity ever have.
lenders.occupational_info: I help small businesses manage money and finance their operations.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do and I can.

lenders.name: rob & emily
lenders.loan_because: As long as we have more than we need, we believe it is important to help those who have less than they need.

lenders.name: Dominic
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should be given the chance to fulfill their dreams.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: a little less on my side is much more on the other side

lenders.name: Joey
lenders.loan_because: nothing is more important than life and nothing is more personal than business.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am part of a Los Angeles-based creative team founded by a group of young adults and inspired by the youths of today. Specializing in high-impact promotions and marketing, brand creation, and identity development for a wide-ranging and influential group of businesses and private clients. 

Our multi-disciplinary team consists of tomorrow's tastemakers and today's trendsetters with creative intentions. We are united by shared independent passions: modernity, film, technology, art, nightlife, music, and fashion

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: I am able to
lenders.occupational_info: Bringing a love for Spanish language and culture to students in DC

lenders.name: Alastair
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired. I worked for a long time with Xerox Corporation.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because:
I want to encourage initiative by helping people to help themselves.
Now, 3 years on and having just returned from a trip to the poorer areas of South America I am making my focus, housing.

lenders.name: Tami & Dave
lenders.loan_because: We respect anyone who is making an effort to succeed in this life.  We understand that we are lucky to have the opportunities available to us, and we'd like to help someone who doesn't have the same kind of luck.
lenders.occupational_info: We both have Ph.D.s in Mathematics.  Tami is a wedding planner.  Dave is a postdoc.

lenders.name: Coach Bob
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach kids sports.

lenders.name: Patrice
lenders.loan_because:
I want a better world; a world where there are fewer fences; fewer boundaries, and hostilities.
I may not be able to change the actions of governments, nor greedy individuals, and corporations; but perhaps my small actions, just might touch someone's life, and make it a little bit better.
I believe all of humanity, is family; the family of mankind; regardless of where we are in the world.
As an African American, many see me, as lesser, and lower, and deserving of a poorer quality of life. I cannot change their beliefs; but I can live my life, in a manner, that touches other human beings, as if, they are my extended family; because I believe we are all, just that, distant family.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for human development, and evolution

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is an admirable way to fight poverty. Microfinance is a convincing, practical, longterm solution to poverty. Entrepreneurialism is the backbone of American success, and establishing that in the third world will help end poverty. It is better and more convincing than the "throwing money at the problem" solution of many charities.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student...Political Science major at Xavier University in Cincinnati, Ohio

lenders.name: San Francisco Blue Walk
lenders.loan_because: To give means to receive.    To empower another means to empower oneself.   In order to have PERSONAL peace, one must help create peace LOCALLY and GLOBALLY.
lenders.occupational_info: San Francisco Blue Walk is a Weekly candle light walk for PERSONAL, LOCAL and GLOBAL PEACE.  Find out how you can take part from ANYWHERE IN THE WORLD by visiting the website: www.sfbluewalk.com

lenders.name: Bindi
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers

lenders.name: Zachary
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a profound and lasting impact on another person.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a full time student in university.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: I think Kiva is the future - helping entrepreneurs worldwide start or develop their ventures.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people think about their career goals and how they can reach them, and advise companies on recruiting from us.

lenders.name: Senior Current Issues 07
lenders.loan_because: The Senior Current Issues class of 2007 feels inspired to donate to Kiva in order to provide the third world with an opportunity to better their economy, which ultimately allows individuals of the third world to better their lives. Furthermore, many of us feel that due to the privileges we have in the United States it is our responsibility to help others who are less fortunate than ourselves. It is important to help people achieve their dreams and we do so by donating through micro loans. Finally, we donate because we want to make a change in the world. We believe that there is no better way to change the world than contributing to the people in it because people are the future of this world. Additionally, we feel that micro loans show the advantages of sharing money but most importantly what sharing compassion can actually do for this world. Also, we have spent a lot of time learning about the third world and realize the poverty that consumes it and the masses of people who suffers from it daily. Donating is a concrete way for us to interact with the third world, but most of all to lend a helping hand and show our concern for others who are underprivileged.
lenders.occupational_info: We are just a group of students that care about being awake to the world, and want to give everyone an opportunity to make their lives a better one to live.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: It easy and extremely helpful for people in other countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I have two kids that I take care of 24/7. :)

lenders.name: Richard W Doornink
lenders.loan_because: It's easy to do, the amounts are small and yet they have a significant impact on the lives of others.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I lived in Africa as a young child. My parents immigrated to Canada when I was 8. I've benefitted enormously from living in such a peaceful, tolerant and wealthy country. I run my own business, own my own home, and have raised and educated a wonderful daughter. Now, I would like to help people who are trying to make a difference for themselves, their families and communities  in other, less fortunate parts of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I research, write and edit reports, strategies and other public policy documents concerned with  programs and services for citizens and their communities.

lenders.loan_because: I believe entreperneurship can lead to success for people all over the world
lenders.occupational_info: Manufacturer of composite and aluminium constructions

lenders.loan_because: this is clearly the best way to help people that really need it.  It feels pretty good too.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to keep computer systems and networks secure on the Internet.

lenders.name: Ellen
lenders.occupational_info: I write children's books.

lenders.name: Brianna
lenders.loan_because: it is such an easy way to help alleviate poverty!

lenders.name: Tom Chance
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving people the means to improve their lives.

lenders.name: Austin
lenders.loan_because: I've heard the difference that the amount i would spend on two cd's makes to people and i want to help bring poeple out of poverty in a way that gives them dignity and self-respect.
lenders.occupational_info: Family business in manufacturing and helping run a summer camp for kids.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: You can teach a person to fish... but it helps if they can afford a fishing pole!  Having built 3 businesses from scratch, I strongly associate with entreprenuers in developing countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a 21st century auctioneer with a 19th century work ethic.

lenders.name: Poli
lenders.loan_because: Giving that help I never received.  We fight and squabble over problems that we ourselves create.  We have places of "faith" that urge others to be separate from those who believe otherwise...?  We need to come together as one not create more separation!
lenders.occupational_info: Bringing Greene to the world!

lenders.name: Evan
lenders.loan_because: there are people that need the help.

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I design (and sometimes build) costumes for theatrical and dance productions and I also work part-time in a coffee shop.

lenders.name: Odd Christer
lenders.loan_because: It's a good way to see direct results and hopefully it also contributes to the people and community around the person getting the loan.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a copy editor.

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: Mom always said to give something back.  I think that most people only need a little help to go a long way. Plus, I have non-specific liberal guilt.
lenders.occupational_info: I help make sure that my company does its work right.  I do this by examining how we do things and then give them ideas on how to do better.  I am not popular.

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: This is a great idea!

lenders.name: Sally, Ross, CA
lenders.loan_because: I want to connect with people around the world.  We can all add to each other's success.
lenders.occupational_info: I do a lot of different things for the people I work with so that their time is spent being productive.  My favorite task is helping to organize conferences.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Aden and Esan
lenders.loan_because: I got a very generous gift from a family friend to start a Kiva account. What better gift than to give other people the chance to be successful in life?

lenders.name: tricia
lenders.loan_because: I love helping and don't have much to offer.  This site makes me feel that I am making a difference. Even a little is better than none!
lenders.occupational_info: I run the lunch program at a school. I order the food and create the menus for the students.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I believe that we all should help others that are economically impoverished, and by providing the loans helps out a vast majority of individuals to rebuild there lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Simply a caring individual offering a helping hand now and again...

lenders.name: Juha
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: KTB
lenders.loan_because: ....to whomever much is given, of him will much be required.....
lenders.occupational_info: park ranger

lenders.name: Jimena
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the people’s potential to help each other. I think Kiva gives a perfect opportunity to do so by enhancing trust and responsibility.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am Mexican and I have had the opportunity to live and work in several countries. 
I was a consultant and a Kiva translator and now I am a business school student.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: Every entrepreneur needs a break.  Access to capital is a critical part of what stiffles or grows great companies.  The best way I know how to make a difference is to help others create jobs for their communities.  In a small way, I'm accomplishing this.
lenders.occupational_info: A serial entrepreneur with the goal of making meaning in everything I'm involved in.  Life is too short not to be passionate.

lenders.name: Byron & Laura
lenders.loan_because: The small amount i loan can make a big difference in peoples lives. Unlike the world bank this money goes directly to the people to help solve economic problems in their country.
lenders.occupational_info: Self  emlpoyed .

lenders.name: Dre
lenders.occupational_info: Global Adventurer. Philanthropist.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a fantastic way to help people in need to help themselves

lenders.name: ~Toby & Heather~
lenders.loan_because:
We are also self employed! 
We admire  people that have the motivation to work for themselfs.
lenders.occupational_info: We have a trucking company. We haul livestock and have Dozers and Water Truck s for Fire Supoort Services. I also buy and sell real estate.

lenders.name: Debra
lenders.loan_because: It is an honor to be able to help those who want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies buy property and build homes, offices, and stores.

lenders.name: Mike Olmstead
lenders.loan_because: I consider it a privilege to be allowed to help. May the God(s) shine on You, Your  families and Your businesses.

lenders.name: MaxandJack
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone help themselves and support agriculture at the same time.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because:
Everyone deserves a chance.

One latte or cocktail a day less can make the difference in another persons life.
lenders.occupational_info: Business to business sales

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I think that it really is a revolutionary grassroots way to help people directly.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: My mission at work is "to help others succeed"..  Kiva seems like a perfect extension into my private life...
lenders.occupational_info: I work in Marketing in the Foodservice industry...  working with manufacturers and our buyers to bring new items to our customers....

lenders.name: David & Wife Ajla
lenders.loan_because: A young child in Chiapas , Mexico gave my daughter some small pottery toys and then women in a small village in central Turkey in 2005 gave my wife and myself a jar of hand picked pine nuts. Some of the nicest people we have met in our travels were also those with less. We cannot repay their generosity and kindness.
lenders.occupational_info:
Ajla works in local government. She also has worked for the United Nations and various NGO's. 

David retired from a 30 year career in law enforcement and has also worked for the United Nations in Bosnia and East Timor as well the Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe, in Bosnia and Kosovo.

lenders.name: Simon
lenders.loan_because: I want to pay it forward
lenders.occupational_info: I buy and sell finely used books all over the world.

lenders.name: A&L
lenders.loan_because: We are all in the same boat, so we need to help each other

lenders.name: Timothy
lenders.loan_because: I want to give people the opportunity to better their lives.

lenders.name: Ian
lenders.loan_because: If people had not given me a chance, had faith in my abilities I would not be able to loan. QED
lenders.occupational_info: I am a sales person who is fortunate to sell enjoyment to others

lenders.name: Saasu.com
lenders.loan_because: We see Kiva as one of the best ways to deliver on the goals of the Saasu foundation. you can see more at http://www.saasu.com/foundation/
lenders.occupational_info: easy online accounting

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: It is a privilege for me to be a small part of the effort to help other people help themselves by improving their businesses. What a wonderful way to connect people on the Internet for such a good cause.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a librarian and teacher in a middle school.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because:
“He who wished to secure the good of others, has already secured his own.”
- Confucius

lenders.name: Olivia
lenders.loan_because: My Aunt Heidi and my Uncle Tony gave me the gift of responsibility for my very first birthday.  I loan to help other families with children.  I also chose my first loan in  honor of my Aunt Regina, who just graduated from Pharmacy school.

lenders.name: Daniela
lenders.loan_because: Enterprise and small business creation is the best way to financial independency.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell real estate

lenders.name: Lynn and Brett
lenders.loan_because: It is an easy and fun way to help people. We admire these people's drive and ambition.
lenders.occupational_info: clothing and jewelry designers sales representative

lenders.name: Debb
lenders.loan_because: I remember the first time someone believed in me and gave me a chance to achieve my dreams.

lenders.name: AJAY
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to stand on his or her own feet
lenders.occupational_info: i create from what i learn

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: microfinance makes sense and because of the satisfaction I get knowing that through these loans real people are bettering their lives.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: I've had many blessings and this is a chance to share with others in a meaningful way.
lenders.occupational_info: My career was in newspapers. I'm now a free-lance book reviewer.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: It's such a great opportunity to help our neighbors increase their earning power.  I am very grateful that I am able to participate..
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a retired horticulturist.

lenders.name: Bluejacket01
lenders.loan_because: because I can.
lenders.occupational_info:
And again I say unto you, It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle, than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God. Matthew 19:24

A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.  Lao-tzu, The Way of Lao-tzu - Chinese philosopher (604 BC - 531 BC)

lenders.name: Helen
lenders.loan_because: In giving,  I receive

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: Simply because I enjoy helping others!
lenders.occupational_info: I recruit MBA students to study at INSEAD.

lenders.name: Joy
lenders.loan_because: It's great to have the opportunity to support people striving for a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with antenatal care, that is with looking after pregnant women and helping them have the healthiest possible babies. I also work with other aspects of reproductive health such as family planning and preventing infections.

lenders.name: Matt and Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: We want to share what we have to enable others to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: Matt works with teenagers who are in need of social and spiritual guidance and also works as an English teacher; Jennifer teaches reading to children in public school who have difficulty learning because of health issues; she also directs the musical portion of worship services at our church.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: trade not aid anyone?
lenders.occupational_info: Making computers work together in a clever way

lenders.name: Frederick & Scott
lenders.loan_because: A century of gifts have done nothing to alleviate global poverty.

lenders.name: Christina
lenders.loan_because: Investing in people is safer than the stockmarket.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist an attorney who helps people with their legal needs.

lenders.name: Maureen
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the potential of all people and want to provide opportunities for success for more people.
lenders.occupational_info: I volunteer where I can make a difference for others.

lenders.name: Stefan
lenders.loan_because:
I think that project specific help is way better than just pumping out money to the big charity organizations.

I also believe that aid can get the receivers into a struggle, wondering why they should ever try to improve their life if they can get money for not doing anything at all.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I want to share some of the good fortune I've had in my life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an association of long-term care providers to ensure that they can continue to provide quality care to the seniors in their facilities.

lenders.name: Jeanne
lenders.loan_because: it's an investment in global prosperity.

lenders.name: Helder
lenders.loan_because: $25 for me is almost nothing but its a lot for this people

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: Someone recently reminded me that I'm rich with life.  I AM lucky to have the life I am living.  Why not help make someone else's life better? Especially when they already want to help themselves

lenders.name: Gia
lenders.loan_because: I like the way the Kiva organization is set up where you are not just giving money but lending it so the people have to work just like everyone else.

lenders.name: Hotel Adriark Book Club
lenders.loan_because: We like to play, but at the same time, while we're playing, we're doing something that gives back.
lenders.occupational_info: Read about us here!

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: It feels really good to be a GOOD Banker!
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers, and I also work with Metals. I make things from Metals and I Fix computers.

lenders.name: Hillsboro Presbyterian
lenders.loan_because: Our Church is always looking for more ways to help others in need.  This is one of the best way we have found to help people in other countries.

lenders.name: Sylvia & Jeff
lenders.loan_because: We were given the money as a birthday present from our son.
lenders.occupational_info: We are now retired from social work .  Currently we are travelling around Australia and New Zealand

lenders.name: Tyler
lenders.loan_because: I know what it is like to start a small business, and how challenging and rewarding it can be. I hope to empower others to grow their own businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a graphic design studio in San Francisco, and we create printed materials and websites for small start-up businesses and large international brands.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: it's my human responsibility to help others and to give as much as I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full time grad student.

lenders.name: Shauna
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance.
lenders.occupational_info:
I teach history to students 16-18 years old.  

Gianni owns a small Italian restaurant in our town.

lenders.name: Harvey
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people who are willing to work hard to achieve their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired farmer from Ohio.

lenders.name: Donno
lenders.loan_because: I want to support micro-lending which holds promise of ending poverty on our planet.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people & companies design profitable products.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: it empowers people to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach world history and economics.  I also teach students about problems of poverty in the world, and encourage them to be a part of the solution.

lenders.name: dexter
lenders.loan_because: shouldn't  we all?

lenders.name: Dunsirn Family
lenders.loan_because: I'm inspired by the will and dedication those in challenging areas of the world put forth into making their lives and communities better. Never give up.
lenders.occupational_info: Own a IT healthcare consulting company.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Heather & Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I want to give someone an opportunity.

lenders.name: Susanne
lenders.loan_because: Microloans are a terrific way to empower people who are neglected by the world's financial sector.  I hope that this sort of seed money will, over years, elevate the living standards and quality for people around the world.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I'm a nice person.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in Philanthropy. I cook, read and write by day and cuddle my husband and cat by night.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I believe that Kiva is a great way to help out people that want to help themselves!  Their stories are so very inspiring.

lenders.name: Jeannie
lenders.loan_because: How could I not loan when I have been blessed with so much? To go with ignorance to other's struggles is truly discouraging. I loan because if I didn't, I would not be human.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a high school student who is trying to learn more about the world around me so I can do whatever I can to make it a better place.

lenders.name: COLOR & Tailor
lenders.loan_because: Because we are all stewards, and it is our duty to empower others to new levels of stewardship so they in turn can do the same for others.
lenders.occupational_info: Colorful and tailored home furnishings.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I invest in things of value and the greatest value lies in the dreams of honest, hard-working people throughout the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I invest and raise capital for startup companies.

lenders.name: Lawrence
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate enough to be able to assist.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Melanie and I want to help people who live in gemstone source countries.  We feel that they do not get their fair share of the value of the rough that they sell, so we want to level the playing field by loaning some of our profits back to such countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I travel frequently between the United States and Thailand where I buy rough and cut gemstones.  I sell mostly to private clients here in the U.S.

lenders.name: Helge
lenders.loan_because: I started a freelance business in 2002 and received a financial help for startups for the first six month. I think it is a great idea to help people to start their own business. So they can do what they really like, serve other people and find a new perspective for life.
lenders.occupational_info: I write articles for Germanys mostly visited news website, for ex. about the latest mobile phones, new internet services and gadgets.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I think it is awesome that we can now be more connected to the world
lenders.occupational_info: I treat children with cancer and do research into how cancer cells resist cancer medicines.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I believe that this kind of lending is the best path to alleviating poverty while generating empowerment.
lenders.occupational_info: I study international affairs with a focus on economic and social development and hope to some day start an organization that like Kiva, will strive to make a difference in the world.

lenders.name: Non Vintage Apparel
lenders.loan_because: We should share with those who are less fortunate than us.
lenders.occupational_info: Drinking and clothing.

lenders.name: Marion
lenders.loan_because: I believe in microcredit!

lenders.name: Camilo
lenders.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship.

lenders.name: Jenny
lenders.occupational_info: I live in Hong Kong and teach at an international secondary school.

lenders.name: Zachary
lenders.loan_because: I sold my car before joining the Peace Corps and wanted to put that money to good use.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a small, rural  village in Morocco to promote environmental education in the nearby national park.

lenders.name: Davide
lenders.loan_because: chi vuol muovere il mondo, muova se stesso - (thanks to Socrate and Phibbi)

lenders.name: Margret & Reinhard
lenders.loan_because: It is only a small contribution for a couple of us to help fighting against poverty. If everyone participates, we can make the world better! And it's really fun!
lenders.occupational_info: Software Sales within International Enterprises

lenders.name: M. Frances
lenders.loan_because: I've visited Ghana and seen the need for us (Americans), who posess and consume so much of the world's goods , to share with those who have so little that would greatly improve their quality of life...I am also a Bible believing Christian who follows  Jesus' directive that we care for the poor.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a Senior Pastor in a Black Baptist Church

lenders.name: Connie
lenders.loan_because: I have been so lucky and blessed in life.  I want to share.

lenders.name: Oliver
lenders.loan_because: i can

lenders.name: François
lenders.loan_because: Thanks to Kiva organization for providing an amazing opportunity to help people throughout the world.
lenders.occupational_info: For me the top priority is to alleviate suffering whenever and where it arises.

lenders.name: The Kisses
lenders.loan_because: "Teach a man to fish and he will eat for a lifetime"

lenders.name: Li-Mod&Con07Spring
lenders.loan_because: I want to bring blessings to others.
lenders.occupational_info: Discover and transmit knowledge.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: Micro-credit makes a real difference. By loaning through Kiva I can show others how easy it is to make a difference.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: people with good business ideas deserve a line of credit, especially when the banks say no.

lenders.name: Jeffrey
lenders.occupational_info: I am an immunologist, studying how the immune system works to protect our bodies from disease and infection.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because:
I want to make a difference. I want to be able to help others reach their goals and live out their dreams. Everyone deserves someone to believe in them. I believe - I wish more people did too. 

We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.
                              -Winston Churchill
lenders.occupational_info:
I am currently a International Development / African Studies major at Michigan State University in East Lansing,Michigan, USA. I also have a partime job working at a grocery store where I am a clerk. In my sparetime outside of  working and school, I love spending time with my family and friends, relaxing, listening to music and volunteering my time in my community. 
** My primary interest is in Africa, especially Ghana where I have visited in August of 2006. I visited there for a study abroad trip through my school. It is the most amazing place I have ever been. I will be returning to Ghana (Kumasi actually) in December to visit. I hope to one day relocate to Ghana to live. I enjoyed it so much I did not want to come back to the U.S!!! :)

lenders.name: Drew
lenders.occupation: WGBH National Center for Accessible Media
lenders.loan_because: I saw the special on Frontline World while eating lunch and was inspired by the idea that so much good could come from such a simple act.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at WGBH part of Public Television, we produce shows like Frontline that aired a special on Kiva in Uganda.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I am able to and its such a little thing to do for us that are so blessed to live in a land of prosperity. It also helps people to help themselves and is not a handout. I can certainly afford to lose the small amout I have lent but believe that most of it will be paid back to be lent again and again. This is a great program.

lenders.name: Anna and Bryan
lenders.loan_because: It makes sense for all of us that people have opportunities to realize their potential.

lenders.name: Stormie
lenders.loan_because: I have extra.

lenders.name: sherry
lenders.loan_because: I feel like being able to give to real people trying to better themselves helps me make a tangible difference in the world
lenders.occupational_info: I care for a wide range of medically ill and trauma patients in a very fast paced emergency room

lenders.name: Vivek Mohan
lenders.loan_because: I am what I am today because someone else gave me a loan to make my education a reality. 'Pay it forward....'
lenders.occupational_info: I work with patients that cant walk or walk with alot of pain. I operate on them hoping that they will have a normal life afterwards

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.loan_because: Small things can make a big difference!

lenders.name: Michell
lenders.loan_because: Because abundance should be shared, and I believe that what might seem trivial to one person can give someone else hope and faith.  Always hoping that others may succeed and make their lives better.

lenders.name: Roy
lenders.loan_because: Because when I have spent time overseas, complete strangers have shown me kindness and love.  I want to share that same type of kindness with others.

lenders.name: Anton
lenders.loan_because: Giving a micro loan may be one of the best ways of helping people

lenders.name: Betty
lenders.loan_because: We all need to make the world a better place.  This is one way.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired high school English teacher.  My life's work has always been "children" in one form or another.

lenders.name: Brandon
lenders.loan_because: It doesn't have the stigma of charity, but doesn't exploit people who need help like a first world bank or local loan shark would, and puts people ahead of profits, which is the way it should always be.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to the local University and work in a kitchen part time.

lenders.name: Sandy
lenders.loan_because: This is a GREAT program and great cause. I spent some time in West Africa and really saw true entrepreneurship at work. It feels great to support that in emerging countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Human Resources Director at a company.I help employees and managers be the best they can be. I also have side companies that I have formed.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a fighting chance.  I know how it feels to be down on your luck.  If a little bit of money can help another person, who am I to deny that?
lenders.occupational_info: Well, it puts a new lease on life.  It is such an incredible feeling to help someone who before this organization wasn't helped, is amazing.

lenders.name: The Riedmans
lenders.loan_because: it is great way to change the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Selling technology to improve manufacturing & warehousing work flows.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can and it feels great to help someone out.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Manager

lenders.name: Karimah
lenders.loan_because: they need it
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student. I work primarily to raise money to help others and so I eat on occasion. I am supported by my family, so I feel like I should support those who are not.

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: This is one of the best thing I see thus Far that can help to eradicate Extreme poverty
lenders.occupational_info: I work with networks;  I help make the internet work

lenders.name: Alicia
lenders.loan_because: I can.  If I can make a difference in the life of someone who is motivated to help themselves, why not give them a leg up through a microloan?
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a university.  My job is to try to figure out what the university should become 10 years in the future - and what needs to be done to make that happen.

lenders.name: Benjamin
lenders.loan_because: If someone out there wants to better their situation, I will help.

lenders.name: Ian
lenders.loan_because: The feeling of direct involvement that Kiva gives me makes my small efforts seem much more concentrated and meaningful.

lenders.name: SLAAP
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we care about making a difference in someone's life...
lenders.occupational_info: We Sustain Land Animals and People through Fair Trade Sales.

lenders.name: Fedua Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people either buy or sell homes.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Gigi
lenders.loan_because: I want to show my support for people who are working for a better life for themselves and their families!
lenders.occupational_info: I install new computer systems and teach people how to use them.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: We should all do more to help those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I study fish to help make sure there are enough fish for everyone.

lenders.name: Trina
lenders.loan_because: This is the easiest and most effective way I've seen yet to make a difference in the devloping world.
lenders.occupational_info: I chase, feed, clothe, and wipe the tears of our four little boys, ages four and under. Before doing this, I taught fourth grade and wrote a children's book. I also spent 4 summers in Zambia helping to start a school for AIDS orphans.

lenders.name: Phil and Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: It is an excellent way to assist people in small business and help make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: We are goodwill ambassadors for the USA at a time when we need positive actions to offset the wars and greed  demonstrated by most large corporations.

lenders.name: Jordon
lenders.loan_because: along the way others have helped me.
lenders.occupational_info: I pastor a new church in the middle of Canada.

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.loan_because: I want to help somebody else.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide regulatory and scientific expertise to pharmaceutical and petrochemical companies.

lenders.name: Wendy
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info:
I sell books for a living. I also do beadwork and I spend far too much time online. 

I am also a member of kivafriends.org.

lenders.name: Boris
lenders.whereabouts: Rio de Janeiro Rio de Janeiro

lenders.name: Carla
lenders.loan_because: Its a wonderful way to empower people in a big way with a small amount of money.  I feel really good about being able to give something to someone to help them have a better life.  I'm blessed to have everything I want and need.
lenders.occupational_info: I supervise office workers and write contracts for services needed by my department.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: It's necessary.

lenders.name: Helen

lenders.occupational_info: I am a mother to 2 wonderful girls, 5 & 1.

lenders.name: Taylor
lenders.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place.

lenders.name: RTG
lenders.loan_because: Opportunity is all most people want and need.  Give someone a fish and they eat for a day; teach someone to fish and they eat for a lifetime.
lenders.occupational_info: I care for people.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone should have the opportunity to do a job they love and want to help them succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a financial analyst for a regional HMO.

lenders.name: Chris & Jon
lenders.loan_because:
I remember saying at one point in my life "I would be happy just to pay my bills on time." That goal was eventually realized, and I would like to help someone else who works as hard as I did to get past a similar moment and reach a goal.

I'm not of the mindset that you need to blow something up to make it better, and I'd also rather the world know that Americans are not destructive people, despite our current Presidential and Congressional representation. If this serves both the individual in need and the American public in any small percentage, the effort is well worth it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Director of Sales for Hilton Hotels. I deal daily with people from all around the globe, and truly love it.

lenders.name: Spartan
lenders.loan_because:
I can and it is fun to be sure!  Moreover because I was in the same position as the Kiva clients and to some degree I still am at times. 

You see I started my first business when I was seven years old for fun. A couple years later it became something of a necessity when my mother developed cancer. Anyway, I have pretty much worked for myself ever since with the exception of nearly a decade of time I spent in the military.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to educate and empower people to make improvements in their lives.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I believe it's a great way to help others around the world improve their quality of life, while reducing and hopefully eventually eliminating poverty one person at a time.

lenders.name: Steve & Natalie
lenders.loan_because:
As citizens of the United States we are incredibly blessed, and it is our responsibility to demonstrate to the world that we as individuals are better than our government.  

Our Lord Jesus expects us to put others first before ourselves, as He did.  Whatever money we have doesn't belong to us, it belongs to Him.  Where else should these funds go except to His children?  It's wonderful to have the opportunity to do something positive in this life!  

Matthew 25:14-30

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people who are working hard trying to better themselves through hard work and determination.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist small businesses and their owners obtain working capital

lenders.loan_because: This is an outstanding idea. Helping people to improve their quality of life by lending capital to build their businesses is the best way to make the world a better place.

lenders.name: Debbie
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have the chance to work to make a better life for themselves and their families.

lenders.loan_because: I want to help people start/grow their businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: My company owns websites and sells advertising on them.

lenders.name: Jesse
lenders.loan_because: It's nice to give back a little every once in a while!  I totally support entrepreneurialism and hope that I can also help someone work towards their goals and dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm in the lending business myself.  I lend to individuals that are looking to purchase land or buy a home.

lenders.name: Wanda
lenders.loan_because: I'm grateful for all that I have, for being born in a country of privilege and opportunity.  I see it as a moral dictate to do whatever I can, whenever I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of patients in the Coronary Intensive Care Unit of a large hospital in Minnesota, on the shore of Lake Superior.  The work is demanding, but rewarding.

lenders.name: Mariesa, Baxter & Bre
lenders.loan_because: There is such a great need in the world to support others who are less fortunate than those in the United States.  In a news environment usually filled with war and violence, congratulations to CNN for running a story that introduced our family to the KIVA organization.  I have been involved in many community organizations over the years, including being one of the founders of a K-8 school that both of my daughters attended here in Los Angeles.  The experience of starting a community based school was an example of how a small group of people are capable of helping to  "seed" the dreams of others, resulting in a positve contribution to the world we share together.  Being active as a KIVA lender will hopefully be an ongoing, positive example for my daughters and encourage others to get involved in this worthwhile effort.
lenders.occupational_info:
I have produced films and television programs for networks and studios including CBS, NBC, ABC and HBO.  Currently I am working with a partner to create the follow up show to Mister Rogers' Neighborhood for pre-school children.
Warm regards,
Bill

lenders.name: Austin Kenworthy
lenders.occupation: Assistant Manager at a Movie theater
lenders.loan_because: I've been lucky enough to have been raised middle class and not have to struggle, I despise the way the banking system is setup to keep the poor struggling and the rich benefit. I would like to see others in the world have the opportunities  to better their situations that I lucked into.
lenders.occupational_info: I run movies so people can escape the reality and stress of their everyday lives. It puts a little joy into others lives even if its only for a few hours. Its not important work but if I can make enough to share with others then its worth it.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me with so much, that I'd have to be a complete jerk not to share some of it.  Too many Americans and Christians don't live up to their calling.  This is a way that I'm trying to live up to mine.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm going to college studying economics and sociology.

lenders.occupational_info: I sell appliances for the home, trying to fill the neeeds and wants of the customer with the right product.
